help-file.title: "ESHABALAS VITALITY"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
This spell infuses your lifeforce with the power of Eshabala, expanding the lifeforce capacity by a significant amount for a limited period of time, with the amount dependent on the level of the caster.
